entry.title: Zopfli and Zopflipng Windows Binaries
entry.summary: Zopfli Zopfli Compression Algorithm is a compression library programmed in C to perform very good, but slow, deflate or zlib compression. Zopfli Github Repositiory: https://github.com/google/zopfli Download Compiled at 2021/10/31 Cross Compiled using WSL (UBUNTU) Zopfli Download Virustotal Results ZopfliPNG ZopfliPNG is a command line program to optimize the Portable Network Graphics (PN...

entry.title: Aegisub Documentation Backup
entry.summary: What is this? This is a backup of docs.aegisub.org. I found a backup of the website while searching for Aegisub’s Documentation and for some reason the website doesn’t work. So I searched for backups and I found a Reddit post that has a Google Drive link. I downloaded it and checked it and it’s legit so I created a Github Pages page for it. Link The Link

entry.title: TenSura Light Novel Art Colorized using Style2Paints V4

link.title: TenSura Light Novel Art Colorized using Style2Paints V4

entry.summary: How I did it I used a tool called Style2Paints. It let’s you color line arts using AI. I used a lot of Human hints to fix a lot of the color problems that the initial painting has. I also used the colored cover of TenSura Vol. 5 as a Reference. The line art also comes from the Status Section of TenSura Vol. 5 and used the portrait from there and upscaled it with Waifu2x to get a higher resolu...
